name: Deathwish
description: Deathwish wasRache Bartmoss's pet cybernetically enhanced cat. According to Bartmoss himself, the cat held the remnants of a human personality he had downloaded from theNet. On April 16th,2013, Deathwish made a brief but notable appearance afterJohnny SilverhandandAlt Cunninghamwere attacked in an alleyway behindThe Hammer. Deathwish acted as Bartmoss's last line of defense against theArasakataskforce that was dedicated to finding and killing him in2022. Deathwish was a solid black hairless cat that had been modified with titanium rippers in its mouth and paws and optical implants with tiny...
